article.title: SRCTec to Provide Spares for Counter Mortar Radar System
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: SRCTec Incorporated, North Syracuse, New York, was awarded a $14 million bridge contract to provide spare parts for the Lightweight Counter Mortar Radar System. Using service is U.S. Army.Â The Defense Logistics Agency Land and Maritime at Aberdeen, Aberdeen, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
